entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
